website_summaries.verdict: Good supplement to use before workouts and after to help with recovery periods.
pros: Uses L-carnitine and L-tartrate to help users increase their metabolism
Delivers improved levels of focus and energy, which will help with workouts
When taken before meals, it provides weight loss benefits
cons: Gives some people a feeling of nausea and shakiness after taking it

customer_reviews.title: Worst thermogenic ever
customer_reviews.text: Guys, dont buy this thing is like taking a overdose of caffeine everytime, its insane how they can sell this and almost no one complaints... Like i took one pill this morning and felt nausea and my heart is doing strange pulsating rythm like every couple of minutes for the past 12+hours.... For real, dont recommend this to anyone and also they dont offer Refund! Glad i got amazon prime and they got my back. Because this company is selling overdose on a pill calling it thermogenic... Im used to thermogenic but this was that caused the worst reaction, i dont know if it was the 20 coffees caffeine per dose or the yohimbine or other ingridient! RUN
customer_reviews.author: Coco_NutzZz

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Product
customer_reviews.text: I took 1 pill for the 1st 2 days and 2 pills on the 3rd day and drank the recommended amount of water. I didn't like how jittery I felt from the caffeine so on the 4th day i only took 1 pill, but I noticed my urine was very dark so I decided I would stop taking them. I woke up the next day(yesterday) with a dull pain on my right side, my urine was still dark, and there was blood. i am hoping these pills didn't do any permanent damage. I should have researched the side effects before I bought them. I cannot even get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bam

customer_reviews.title: Exercise
customer_reviews.text: For me, a very short/small woman, this product works well shortly before a rigorous workout. If I take this and try to sit around the house, my heart will race, I start to sweat and have a general feeling of uneasiness. I find that taking 1 pill (half the dosage) is best for me and I only take it before I plan to exercise which it helps IMMENSELY with, I have a lot more drive, energy and stamina to complete my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Iodrome

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - Gave Me Sickness I Was Not Used To
customer_reviews.text: Just like anyone else I had the intention of loosing some fat and thought why not have a little extra help from hydroxycut. After taking the recommended dosage I felt weird in a way I haven't ever experienced and soon after felt like I was going to pass out. I had a migraine and while I have had migraines in the past, this one felt very different and I felt it in my stomach as well. I would advise you stay away from this or products like it.
customer_reviews.author: SuperEaglesFly

customer_reviews.title: Read befor u buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product works really well i advice to read instruction before taki it it says 30min befor diner or other greater food u will it during day it, also its advice to hold low fat diet with it its just helping ur diet it dorsn makey u skiner just for eating this pils and then you can go to mc buy 5 big macs, those pils may make your stomach upset or other side efect, please make sure what you buying befor taking and making dumb statements.
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: Great formula!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these before in an attempt to lose weight...and these are the best Hydroxycut formula in my opinion. They are serious business, so start out with 1 with every meal before advancing on to more than that! They do make me a little sweaty and definitely supply a kick, but I like that for some reason. Obviously they are not a magic pill to solve all your issues, but they make eating less easier and give you some energy to get through the day!
customer_reviews.author: TLN

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ IT if you don't want to end in the SHOCK ROOM.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this product. I followed the instructions as stated on the label. On my second day of taking Hydroxycut, I had a "normal" day, hours later I vanished and had 4 seizures. Long-story-short... ended in the shock room at the hospital, had 1 respiratory arrest which required advanced CPR, glucose level 300, creatinine 7.5, leukocytes 40,000... I was sedated for 4 days with intubation + 3 days with an oxygen ventilator + 4 more days at the hospital and 14 days doing home recovery. PLEASE THINK TWICE BEFORE BUYING THIS PRODUCT. My 3 little-boys almost lose his dad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for energy
customer_reviews.text: I've used Hydroxycut on and off for many years. I don't use it to lose weight; I use it to perk me up so I get up and out of the house to tackle the day's obstacles. And you know what? It works great for that purpose. Sometimes it makes me mildly jittery, but it doesn't happen that often and it doesn't bother me too much when it does. The fact that I'm up and about and accomplishing things brightens my mood immensely so a few jitters here and there are nothing compared to being up and at'em.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, I've lost 11 pounds in 15 days
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, I've lost 11 pounds in 15 days. This product has 2 great benefits, 1) you don't feel much pain while you workout. 2) you don't have to handle the annoying sense of hunger even when you are making diet. Fully recommend. But it has a very strange secondary effect, your legs and arms fall sleep very easily, maybe this product do something with your blood or maybe with your circulatory system. But belive me, if you wanna lose weight, this product is for you. 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟
customer_reviews.author: happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Use discussion.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I'm giving these a low rating is because l haven't tried them. I had to get a refund, but they are definitely a good value for your money. My doctor's advised against them because they can cause siezures and damage your liver.lm not extremely over weight and I'm tall, l just wanted to get something that would help me lose the weight lm not comfortable with because I can't run like l use to, do to an injury. So l won't take them. I suggest you read all the reviews, do your research, and run them past your doctor before you decide to purchase these or take them. And if they work well for you, congratulations. Use discression.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. One bottle of 60 caplets at the store costs as much as these two bottles of 100 caplets each. These mixed with my diet and exercise routine have helped me lose 45 pounds in 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a month now. It has toned my muscles more and has replaced my morning coffee and afternoon pre workout shakes. This combined with a simple workout routine will have you cut within a month. All the bad reviews on this product is from people sensitive to caffeine, so don't buy it if your weak and sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Shmeat

customer_reviews.title: Energy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. I use them for weight loss and am down 26 pounds, only 14 to go :) They give you energy and suppress your appetite.
customer_reviews.author: TooMuchSauce

customer_reviews.title: A noticeable difference in two months.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t made any changes to my diet or exercise routine (I’ve been too busy with work, school, and moving) and I haven’t been able to take them as regularly as I should. But in two months, I’ve lost two inches off of my waist. I’ve had several coworkers comment that I look thinner, and I can fit into clothes that I haven’t been able to wear for a long time. I can’t believe how well this actually works, and how quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt lose any weight. Bad headaches!!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished both bottles... havent lost a single pound. Only feel a bit of energy followed by a headache. Only goes away if i sleep. Do not recommend, waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is great at suppressing my appetite and giving me a great boost of energy when I need a pick me up. I take them AFTER I eat. I’ve found that when I take them on an empty stomach, it leaves me feeling very nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Works...Almost too Well | Use AS Directed
customer_reviews.text: I have never taken such a potent item before that actually controlled my appetite. So much so, I could focus on getting stuff done during the day and not be overwhelmed thinking about food all the time. I only take 1 a day. 4 a day was waaaaay too much. 1 is good for me—I also do break days in between because the energy it gives me sometimes has me rolling a bit too fast!
customer_reviews.author: Li'ora

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried numerous thermogenic supplements, and most either don't seem to work or make me nauseous. Following the dosing guide, I have had no issues what so ever (other than a bit hard to sleep when having additional caffeine). This definitely works as an appetite suppressant. Although I don't get the normal sweating of a thermogenic, I do seem to get other effects from it like cold extremities. I would highly recommend as the side effects are very minimal and the return is great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Great to start you off! I have lost 7 lbs in 9 days. I eat toast for breakfast with 2 eggs and spinach tomato and panela cheese. Snack on a muscle milk shake then have lunch eat 4 oz chicken 2 tortillas a slice of panela cheese and then another shake then dinner ! It keeps me with energy with out feeling shaky or nervous. I recommend it dose cut your appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Prepare yourself!
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped me to keep focused while training and do a better workout, it really heats up... but you can keep going longer on your exercise. Just make sure to not do how I did once, I took one too early when I was still at work thinking I could leave soon the office for my training, I got quite nervous with that things and heating me up while I was still in sitting at the office - not a good experience! It’s all about taking it in the right time. It works good when I take before going training in 1-2hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t end up in hospital
customer_reviews.text: Worse weight lost pill I ever took. First I couldn’t sleep at night and my last pill was at 6pm so I was always tired for work. Second I had the worse anxiety I have ever had in my life. My heart was racing and I was constantly out of breathe. Also I didn’t lose any weight I actually gain weight. Stay far far away from this pill unless you want to be admitted into a hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Bottles already opened :(
customer_reviews.text: My product came with the plastic wrap already removed and the seal REMOVED completely. 100% OPENED! Both bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: These can effect your heart.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered HydroxyCut before but this was the first time for these. I took 2 tablets as perscribed and within 30 minutes my heart rate went well above 110. I felt sick for several hours. I waited a week and took only 1 tablet. Again it raised by heartrate and made me feel ill. There are better products that can help curb appetite without making you ill.
customer_reviews.author: SPR

customer_reviews.title: Everything Came In Perfect Condition
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems legit. Solid packaging. Certified seal. Cotton packed. Let’s see what we can do with this in the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Carrington

customer_reviews.title: To much caffeine
customer_reviews.text: Too much caffeine, and I like caffeine... i mean I drink rockstars occasionally, Mt dew and coffee, but this has to much. I want a diet pill that is more than just a high dose of caffeine. I can get caffeine with a simple large cup of coffee. I want something that suppresses my appetite, is thermogenic and is effective and not just an overdose of caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Christian

customer_reviews.title: Smokey?
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in hopes to boost my confidence and my metabolism but the only thing it does is keep me from passing out after lunch. Oh and the other “side affect” is after taking them I burp up smoke ...yea it’s kinda neat! I take 2 and within 5 minutes I’m burping like crazy and smoke is pouring from my mouth! Crazy right! Tastes like dog vomit smells when it happens, luckily my husband loves me anyway and says I’m his fiery dragon when this occurs!
customer_reviews.author: Val (Bubbles)

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried this on multiple occasions (try a couple days, wait a couple weeks and try again) and all it does (for me) is make me nauseous and shaky and NOT want to work out. I’m not caffeine sensitive so it’s not that. All I can say is I’ve never reacted negatively to a supplement like I have to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Meh would be fine just exercising without these
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really do anything except make me jittery. Which the extra caffeine helped with waking up and working out but that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: kiera

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻BAD BAD BAD!👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: These have way too much caffeine for anyone to take. I’ve never felt so sick or edgy in my life. I drink Mountain Dew a lot and never feel bad effects from caffeine. I took these without drinking any caffeinated soda and I’ve never hated life so much. DO NOT BUT THESE! They are terrible for your body and heart. It’s amazing the FDA lets them sell these👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Brayden

customer_reviews.title: Lost 7 Pounds in 7 Days
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Working out and eating right not quite getting the job done? I would suggest using this product. I was working out, eating right, but wasn't really getting anywhere with weight loss. Started taking this product a week ago, have lost one pound per day! Yes, I agree, this will make you jittery (if you're not being active). When you take this, I suggest NOT just sitting around. Go for a walk, get some of your work out started, clean your house.. just do SOMETHING and you won't get that jittery feeling. A bit early to judge how the long term will be, but again, so far - so good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Made my Wife and I So So Sick like we had the flu
customer_reviews.text: Made my Wife and I So So Sick like we had the flu. We wasted a lot of money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I took these for a month and had to stop. The stimulant was gentle enough but they left me feeling sick to my stomach. I just got tired of feeling that way. If there was any benefit from them, it wasn’t much. Ever since they banned ephedra these products have not been very effective in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: The DC Dude

customer_reviews.title: sigh
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pills and man they made me feel like throwing up with stomach ache. I have a high tolerance for caffeine and I drink lots of coffee every day. but there is something in those pills that make me feel so bad. I did threw them away since I couldn't get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: The item is great. Always sealed and unopen and works great for fat loss as long as you have a workout routine or regiment it works great. Helps curve your appetite but you have to drink lots of water which is not a bad thing. Just have to go to the bathroom more times through out the day because of all the water you will be drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great at curbing appetite!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a little over a week now. Important things to mention are that it does an amazing job at curbing my appetite. The other important thing to mention is that it makes you poop more. I know it's gross to hear, but I think it's important to mention. My body has been metabolising food much quicker and therefore my body has been expelling it quicker. I couldn't be happier that I started this during quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great appetite suppressant
customer_reviews.text: I take 1 of these every morning to help with my OMAD lifestyle. I generally eat one meal each day or practice the 20h fast, 4 hour eating method of dieting. It has been great in getting back in shape and helps when I go to my buffets on weekends to treat myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: You won’t sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many weight loss products before. I even had a prescription from my doctor. I had read reviews and knew many had liked this product. I drink a couple strong cups of coffee each morning. This pill had me shaking and jittery all afternoon. I can’t imagine what a few a day would be like. I gave it one star because I could not sleep nor function very well after I took it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: NAUSEA AND SICKNESS
customer_reviews.text: Won’t buy this product Again. I thought it was me at first, but I tried this product in 3 different periods of time. The three times instant vomits, nausea, dizziness, and overall sickness.
customer_reviews.author: ARANALAC

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says - 100%
customer_reviews.text: As a prof dr I can say it does what it states. Furthermore, there are benefit. No such product is FDA approved and in this instance if you are looking for a slight energy boost it will provide. Weight loss dont see it nothing in this product is proven medically to provide this effect period. Nevertheless if you are looking for energy it will provide this in an artificial delivery mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Arran C.

customer_reviews.title: good outweighs the bad
customer_reviews.text: this pill will give you heart palpitations, anxiety attacks, and severe dehydration. that being said, i love this pill more than any other pill on the market. everyone who says diet pills don’t work? wrong, this pill works. you’ll feel horrible while on it, but if you follow instructions—you’ll lose weight fast. i was 5’1 and 128 lbs before i started this pill, now i’m 91 lbs and still aiming to lose. if you want a pill that works then go for this one, but just know that it has affects on your health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s 2 separarte bottle with 100 in each
customer_reviews.text: I used this along time ago and I started again about 2 months ago and I love this product. I’ve noticed that for me just taking one capsule is enough it gives me the energy to do anything 💪🏽💯
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Barzaga

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the older version, these are okay
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase the regular hydroxycut and couldn't find them on amazon anymore. These are okay, they do the job. I feel like the other ones worked better for energy and the extra little bump but I will still repurchase these unless I can find the original instead. Came with 2 bottles, pills are bright red so more distinguishable too.
customer_reviews.author: Noah B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: I've taken two of these, 1 on different days. I'll never take them again! So anxious, shakey and not feeling like myself. I've had plenty of original Ripped Fuel, which I liked. Scrolling through the recommended/similar products, I came across Burn-XT and have found it to be very good. Suppresses my appetite and gives me a good bit of energy, but not too much ( I would take a look at those vs this Hydrocut nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Molina

customer_reviews.title: My husband is extremely pleased. If you buy this product at GMC
customer_reviews.text: My husband is extremely pleased. If you buy this product at GMC, you pay 2 prices for it! This is a very good deal
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a good work out.
customer_reviews.text: These r great for what they are. They are an addition to working out. The wife uses them and they seem to help. But remember, pills such as these are not a substitute for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used this type of pills before. I started using them before my workouts and I started losing weight and sweating more. It definitely gives me a extra boost of energy that I need. If I use it when I don't workout I get all jittery, so I only use it 15-30 minutes before my workout.
customer_reviews.author: martha gomez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: It depend me on what you’re looking for. Yes it suppresses your appetite but it also speeds you up so much without you being able to control it that you don’t even realize your mind is racing. This product caused me to take a sick day from work- it totallyhad my emotions all out of wack to where it was hard to handle everyday life.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Taken 2 capsules a day. 1 in morning 1 in afternoon along with 45min workout and lost 51lbs since my first purchase. Great product and no hard crash side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Manser

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these pills for 3 days. First two days, 1 pill and then the 3rd day 2 pills. Absolutely horror - I was in the bathroom all day on the 3rd day. Shaking, diarrhea, stomach upset, and a horrible migraine. It makes you feel uneasy and not motivated; which is opposite of what you want. I threw $27.00 in the garbage because. DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Smith

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is hardcore, use as directed or LESS
customer_reviews.text: I am using this with the Keto Diet not exceeding 1000 calories a day, Using Yazio to track it with a smart scale. It will make you feel cozy, and it can make you anxious and Cranky when your dieting, but it does help kill cravings and burn extra fat on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy M.

customer_reviews.title: Pills
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really like them. Made feel dizzy, maybe my nervous system is not the best to use this kind of products.
customer_reviews.author: María Angélica

customer_reviews.title: It helps with my energy levels while dieting
customer_reviews.text: This has helped me lose 30 lbs thus far and I have 10 more to go before I hit my goal. I've been combining it with diet and exercise for excellent results. I can definitely feel a difference in my energy on the mornings when I forget to take it. This is not a product that is meant to be used as the only method of weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Shooting pains
customer_reviews.text: I drink A LOT of coffee yet had my first “caffeine overdose” just from taking these pills (when I took them I did not drink anything else other than water) Very scary- started with a foggy headache & then had shooting pains in both of my forearms. Had to call in sick from work to go to the doctor, who said these symptoms were definitely due to the caffeine levels in the pills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives me energy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well this works if taken regularly - I only take it as needed for energy when I need to get things done. Keeps me awake and going, and great energy levels. I only take 1 at the time. 2 bottles are good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M.

customer_reviews.title: Sleepless nights
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to another type I have been buying, this gives little results for a lot of sleepless nights. I don’t take it at night and when I take it during the day, i stool a lot. The price is too much to pay. Would just diet quietly
customer_reviews.author: samsie

customer_reviews.title: Made me poop a lot tho
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm did anybody else poop like crazy taking these or is it just me? Like it works really good too but oh lord I was on that toilet every minute 😂😂 lmaooo!
customer_reviews.author: Mishayla Meikle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have used for years now. Perfect amount of energy for me. Great start to my day.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Nausea, Leg/Arm Cramps and Pain
customer_reviews.text: I've taken their products before and have never felt this level of intense nausea, pain, and muscle cramping that would last all day long. I made sure to have enough food and water throughout the day, and even tried lowering it to 1 pill per day. Completely disappointed and also scared of the formulation. NOT NORMAL.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: .... Up to you boo....
customer_reviews.text: They work, but give me migraines. They may affect you differently. I wont buy again, but I'm not saying not to try.
customer_reviews.author: Fallen Morgue

customer_reviews.title: adverse reaction to product
customer_reviews.text: the manufacturer of this product wrote me that i shoud write you since you store the product in your warehouses and would handle the refund request. i am a faithful customer of amazon and don't want this to be an unpleasant experience. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Stay away unless you want to feel sick
customer_reviews.text: Product caused severe abdominal pain and Nausea For me and my fiancé I recommend you don’t buy won’t let me return product either
customer_reviews.author: Devin Lara

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I eat a complete healthy diet and exercise regularly, and haven't lost any weight in over 1 months of using.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit garbage that can't be returned
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit garbage that can't be returned apparently. Stay clear of the one from RocketRoom.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I buy these all the time, they were out of the 1 package, so I had to buy it in a bundle, it was a dollar or so cheaper, but half as strong. I've never had to take two before.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen Nordstrom Is Me

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I both had allergic reactions to this product. We broke out in large red sores all over our faces and neither of us have ever been allergic to or reacted to anything before. Be careful when purchasing especially if you have sensitive skin or preexisting allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the hospital bill!
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely no heart problems, and this product gave me tremors, and a resting heart rate of 150. I had to go to the hospital and be connected to fluids. If it works for you, more power to you but please please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Provides excellent energy for early gym sessions and I don’t need my morning cup of coffee anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Did not work it made me sick
customer_reviews.text: This product is a complete scam! It made me feel so sick and and insane migraines. It made me hungry. I do not recommend this product. God knows what is really in this stuff. Avoid!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shabana

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Lost 25 lbs in 2
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lost 25 lbs in 2.5 months. Product is great at suppressing appetite and keeping your energy up. People need to realize that this is not a miracle pill. You can't keep eating junk and taking HydroxyCut and expect to lose weight. This is a supplement and is meant to supplement your weight loss. Diet and exercise is key. The only downside is that at first it will make you jittery. Start off with 1 pill a day and work your way up. Not really a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Th3MadScientist

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Missing Items!
customer_reviews.text: The product is actually really good and suppresses your appetite. But it says you get 200 caps(which is two bottles) in the description and only one bottle came. There is no FAQ or way to report missing items that I can find, so I think I’m just out 13 bucks here. Order the double pack at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these pills for some time now and they really give me an energy boost, they don't give me any side effects (thankfully)
customer_reviews.author: ANDREINA

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these in the past and they worked amazing. This order had 0 effect, must have received a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The pills made me nauseous and didn’t give me any energy. I tried one pill at first, felt nothing. When I tried two pills I was nauseous for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyzal

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is a garbage product just google everything they have done they claim it works but they changed the ingredients multiple times. Make you feel like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It Works Really Good For Me
customer_reviews.text: These pills gives me a lot of energy thru the day. I just have to make sure to take them really early in the morning so it wont cause me troubles during night. I also just started to work out and it keeps me with a lot of energy during work out.
customer_reviews.author: Rut Samudio

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me SERIOUS stomach pains every day I took it. One day I barely moved from the couch. I followed directions accordingly and have taken a different type in the past. I quit taking it after 5 days of stomach pain, so it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sick to my stomach, not normal, not fun
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I took 2 pills which was the recommended dose and I felt extremely nauseous for hours. My hands were also shaky and I felt short of breath probably because my heart was beating faster. The worst was the nausea that came after taking these pills. It was awful. I’ve taken hydroycut before and this has been the worst reaction I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love how these make me feel and I can feel the difference in how much better my body is feeling!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: bad for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worst weight loss pill. These only made me use the bathroom every 20 minutes but in 2 months I gained not lost
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Turner

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you up
customer_reviews.text: This stuff will wake you up! Keeps your heart going even when you're being active. Kinda scary but I'll use it if I didn't get enough sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McKenna

customer_reviews.title: This product had a Safety recall
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and after 3 weeks there was a recall due to safety concerns. Never did hear what the safety concerns were.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me awake very well, and alert. No crash and no side effects
customer_reviews.author: Jason N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this a few days now. I feel an effect from it. I feel slightly jittery from it, but it's getting better. I am a vegetarian, so I can't do the gelatin but I drink in morning with my coffee. It aids in appetite also. I've tried many different products, and think this is an advanced formula that I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Katarina7405

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Makes you release.. Works great but haven't seen a difference.. Much yet its been 1 month
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to work on me. I used it like the directions said. Didn't lose ANY weight.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This formula works great for me, it kicks in about 30 minutes after taking it. I feel energized and ready to workout. It’s definitely not a magic pill you have to diet and exercise , but it does help you to sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and reviews are wrong
customer_reviews.text: Did not help at all. Followed strict diet instructions and didn’t do anything different. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Carney

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had jitters or anything from them. More energy that’s about all get warm feeling about half hour after taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Jyaich

customer_reviews.title: Works well when accompanied by good diet and exercise
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Works well for me. Takes some time adjusting to how jittery they make u feel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will.
customer_reviews.text: Personally, used not so much for big weight loss but does help maintain when exercise and a good diet aren't available.
customer_reviews.author: happy jack

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: Adverse effects experienced within 5 days, was however not returnable! (~a week later). after some time they have listed a return window within about 7 weeks of the time i purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Money saver *** weight lost and Energy
customer_reviews.text: This pill have help me with weight lost and energy .. note that you still need to exercise and diet. You can not beat the price for the two bottles. Save a lot of money for both ... you must know you get the bottles only no box
customer_reviews.author: Eder A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: not what it used to be, formula changed in my opinion. There are better products so I only get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Danny frizzell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent.
customer_reviews.text: Can give a jittery feeling but it isn't too bad if you follow the instructions. Be sure to eat + stay hydrated and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great fat burner
customer_reviews.text: Best price available is on Amazon. Best fat burner I’ve ever used with very little side effects
customer_reviews.author: ernest

customer_reviews.title: Skip It
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Did nothing. I followed the instructions word for word.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Try it first for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This product made me nauseous and it made it harder to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Reoyo

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: This one is the best one so far,tried a couple others ,same company were good.if you want something to get you going check this one out!
customer_reviews.author: John quiram

customer_reviews.title: No weight lost
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this on and off for a couple weeks haven't lost any weight
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Effective, fast-acting, no side effects
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to for pre-workout as well as a sustainer for rotating shifts at work. No tremors or any issues associated with other overloaded products.
customer_reviews.author: stopnmeth

product_meta.title: Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite Weight Loss Supplement, Designed for Hardcore Weight Loss, Energy & Enhanced Focus, 100 Servings (200 Pills)
product_meta.description:
Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite is an extreme super thermogenic designed to help you reach your weight loss goals. Unlike other weight loss products, Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite is formulated with a weight loss driver backed by 2 scientific studies.

*Subjects taking the key ingredient in Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite (green coffee extract [C. canephora robusta]) lost 10.95 lbs in 60 days with a low calorie diet and 3.7 lbs in an 8 week study with a calorie reduced diet and moderate exercise. Most thermogenic formulas don’t have any scientific studies backing their key weight loss ingredients, let alone two.

Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite also features a supercharged energizing and thermogenic driver (270mg caffeine anhydrous) in combination with other sensory enhancing ingredients, including 110mg Coleus forskohlii and 100mg L theanine and 56.3mg Yohimbe to deliver a one of a kind sensory experience with every dose.
feature_bullets: Designed for hardcore weight loss: Hydroxycut Hardcore has been designed to help you achieve the significant weight loss results you’ve been looking for
Delivers extreme energy and enhanced focus: Fuel your most intense workouts and tackle your jam packed days with a scientifically researched dose of caffeine anhydrous
Ultimate thermogenic experience: Combined with more unique sensory enhancing ingredients, including Coleus forskohlii and L theanine, this supplement delivers a one of a kind sensory experience
Science backed key weight loss ingredient: Get advanced weight loss from Green Coffee Bean extract researched to show significant results in two scientific studies

Tested for quality and purity: Fully disclosed ingredients that undergo strict quality control, and is third party tested and verified to ensure that each bottle meets the highest standards of purity, quality and consistency
